title: AI Support Assistant
welcomeMessage:
Hello! I'm your AI support assistant. I can help you with:

• Information about Traditional Thai Medicine and herbs
• Navigating the platform features
• Questions about orders and recommendations
• Connecting with practitioners

How can I assist you today?
error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
rateLimitError: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
paymentError: AI service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
escalateDescription: Get help from our support team. Responses typically within 24 hours.
escalateIncludeHistory: Include my conversation history with AI
escalateWarning: ⏱️ Support typically responds within 24 hours via email
